data.message: Yes put back the messenger the way it used to be. Thanks.

NO DOWNLOAD!!
I still haven't downloaded it. I tried it once before t was 'required', didn't like but at all, and deleted it within two minutes. Now I just keep ignoring the suggestions. Ugh, it is annoying
I removed all Facebook apps from my phone and started using http://m.facebook.com since it has all of the functionality the app used to including messaging.
I HATE THE NEW MESSENGER!!!! Maybe if we can get more people to comment their disapproval for the app then facebook will change back to the original application!!! LET'S do ITTTT

New  chat messenger app sucks why try to fix things when there not broke put it back the way it was...

I refuse to download your app or your messenger app.  I refuse to grant your apps access to any and all features, including caller identification, on my mobile phone.  You do not need such access and you have no right to it.
I hate the new messenger!!!!!!!!!
I hate the new messenger. Fb is starting to suck. Quit changing things...
The Facebook team has replied to every post, even one seven hours ago, but are conveniently ignoring this one. 👍
Facebook replies to almost every comment EXCEPT this one... hmmm
Isnt it weird that facebook didnt reply to this, but it replied to the others... Hmm
Idk about u guys but I'm still able to message people through the main Facebook app... Does anyone else still have the availability to do so also or am I just one of the lucky ones ?
I don't care for new separate messenger app at all. I'm just not gonna use it. I loaded it, tried it, hated it, removed it. Just put it back.
i would love to be able to respond to my messages without having the app...i have to go computer to see them...grrrr
No messenger please
How about you all stop bitching and just message people from a computer if you don't want the messenger app. Oh no your convenience is threatened what ever will you do?

u people are paranoid almost 99% of your apps want access similar to the messenger, it just hasnt gotten the attention of the masses. If they really want to spy on you, they will. you giving an app special permission isnt changing anythinf lol

We hear your frustration, Cass, and understand your concerns. We've provided more information about the permissions Messenger requests and how we actually use them here: http://on.fb.me/1qFJKlF . -Jenny

You know the messed up thing is if I was CEO of this company I would want to be more involved with my customers or id get on here and talk to them it's all about American greed these days once they have the power or the money they'll do whatever they want people lost friends over Facebook they've gotten divorced don't talk to each other face-to-face anymore people don't call you anymore people don't hang out with you anymore People got stupid! People have a million fake friends that's what's mostly on people's friends list fake people you have screwed with the way we socialize as human beings why go to someone's house or hang out with them when they could just Facebook you. People lost their selves here and it's your fault how did you think it was going to go Mark? Didn't bring people together draws people more apart! Just don't see it because you're blind and Rich.
